rooms.name: entrance vestibule
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance space that adheres to Vastu guidelines by aligning with the main door position. It features natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: living room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area, designed for joint family gatherings, incorporating contemporary design elements along with traditional motifs as per Indian aesthetics. Proper alignment is maintained per Vastu norms ensuring energy flow.

rooms.name: dining room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with access to a semi-open kitchen. The layout ensures that food preparation does not interfere with family interactions.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed for efficiency and functionality, ensuring proper ventilation (north or east openings) as per Vastu guidelines. Equipped with state-of-the-art appliances.

rooms.name: bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample closet space; placement considered for positive energy flow and privacy as required by joint family dynamics.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Well-ventilated bathroom located conveniently near the bedroom, ensuring ease of access while maintaining privacy. Vastu alignment ensures proper water drainage.

openings.description: Main door placed at a favorable location as per Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Windows strategically located for optimal natural light and ventilation.
Provides access to the swimming pool area with appropriate safety measures.

exterior_features.name: swimming_pool
exterior_features.description: Contemporary design swimming pool with integrated landscaping, located in a serene section of the property ensuring minimal disturbance. The pool area is designed following local building norms and Vastu guidelines for water bodies.

other_details.notes: This design integrates modern aesthetics with traditional principles to create a harmonious living environment. All features are planned considering Indian residential norms and Vastu guidelines.
